content.rendered:
In accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act, 2005, the Canada Green Building Council will offer those with disabilities or other accessibility needs access and aid should it be requested. To make an accessibility request for a particular item on our website or in other material, please contact us or call Toll-Free: (866) 941-1184.

Website Accessibility Statement

CAGBC is committed to making its website accessible to all, by meeting or exceeding the requirements of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 Level A/AA (WCAG 2.1 A/AA). We continue to monitor our site to ensure content is accessible to all visitors. 

Disclaimer

Efforts to improve the accessibility of the website are ongoing as we work to implement the relevant improvements to meet WCAG 2.1 A/AA guidelines.

Third Party Applications

CAGBC makes use of third-party sites such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn. CAGBC does not control nor can it remedy the way content is portrayed.
